amendment.description: To require a report relative to a sole-source contract for the reconstruction of the Iraqi oil industry.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 825 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 825 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S6914, S6919; text: CR S6914) To require a report relative to a sole-source contract for the reconstruction of the Iraqi oil industry.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 825 proposed by Senator Boxer.
